item.title: What is quantization in modern AI ?
item.description: What is quantization ? ‘Quantization’ refers to a broad class of algorithms. Their goal is to reduce the memory footprint of models while retaining as much performance as possible. $$ \text{Quantization} \sim \text{reducing the memory footprint of models} $$ Consider the new Llama 3 70B. If you load it in 32-bit precision on your GPU 1, it will require around (32 / 8) * 70 = 280 GB of VRAM ðŸ¥¶.
